LandingPage.heroSubtitle: Vibrafit helps you stay motivated and achieve your fitness goals with personalized tracking, insights, and daily encouragement.
LandingPage.featureProgressTrackerDescription: Log daily meals and exercises effortlessly. Visualize your journey and celebrate milestones.
LandingPage.featureMotivatorDescription: Receive personalized daily motivational messages powered by AI to keep you inspired.
LandingPage.featureMetricsDescription: Update key metrics like weight and see your progress visualized with intuitive charts.
LandingPage.featureCleanInterfaceDescription: Enjoy a simple, card-based layout designed for easy navigation and information access.
LandingPage.step1Description: Create your account and define what you want to achieve.
LandingPage.step2Description: Log your meals, workouts, and update your metrics regularly.
LandingPage.step3Description: Get daily AI motivation and watch your progress unfold.
LandingPage.ctaTitle: Ready to Start Your Vibrafit Journey?
LandingPage.ctaSubtitle: Join Vibrafit today and take control of your health and fitness.

SignInPage.title: Sign In to Vibrafit
SignInPage.description: Enter your credentials to access your account.
SignInPage.errorUnexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

SignUpPage.title: Create Your Vibrafit Account
SignUpPage.description: Join us to start tracking your fitness journey!
SignUpPage.errorMissingFields: Please fill in all fields and select a role.

UserDashboardPage.readyForWorkoutDescription: Access your personalized routine and track your progress.
UserDashboardPage.progressPicturesDescription: Track your visual transformation. Upload your before and current photos.
UserDashboardPage.photoShareDisclaimer: These images can be shared with your trainer to track visual progress.
UserDashboardPage.refreshErrorToastDescription: Could not update your dashboard info.

AiMotivationCard.personalizedEncouragement: Personalized encouragement is just a step away.
AiMotivationCard.encouragementForJourney: A little encouragement for your journey.
AiMotivationCard.setGoalLink: Set Your Goal on the Nutrition Page →

OnboardingModal.dialogDescription: We're excited to have you. Let's set up your profile to begin your fitness journey.
OnboardingModal.toastWelcomeDescription: You're all set to start your Vibrafit journey.

UserSidebar.toastProfilePicUpdatedDesc: Your new profile picture has been set.
UserSidebar.toastUploadFailedDesc: Could not upload your profile picture.
UserSidebar.toastErrorDesc: An unexpected error occurred during upload.
UserSidebar.toastSignedOutDesc: You have been successfully signed out.

TrainerSidebar.toastProfilePicUpdatedDesc: Your new profile picture has been set.
TrainerSidebar.toastUploadFailedDesc: Could not upload your profile picture.
TrainerSidebar.toastErrorDesc: An unexpected error occurred during upload.
TrainerSidebar.toastSignedOutDesc: You have been successfully signed out.

AdminDashboardPage.title: Admin Dashboard
AdminDashboardPage.description: Manage users, trainers, and application settings.
AdminDashboardPage.userManagementDescription: View, search, and manage user accounts.
AdminDashboardPage.userManagementPlaceholder: User management tools will appear here.
AdminDashboardPage.trainerManagementDescription: Approve, manage, and view trainer profiles.
AdminDashboardPage.trainerManagementPlaceholder: Trainer management tools will appear here.
AdminDashboardPage.systemSettingsPlaceholder: System configuration options will appear here.

MeasurementsPage.title: Your Measurements
MeasurementsPage.description: Keep track of your body metrics to see your progress.
MeasurementsPage.progressChartDescription: Visualizing your weight changes over time.
MeasurementsPage.chartDataDisclaimer: Chart data is based on your saved measurements.
MeasurementsPage.toastUpdatedDesc: Your latest measurements have been saved.
MeasurementsPage.toastUpdateFailedDesc: Could not save your measurements. Please try again.
MeasurementsPage.toastErrorSaveDesc: There was an error while saving.
MeasurementsPage.sessionExpiredDesc: Please sign in again to continue.
MeasurementsPage.toastErrorLoadDesc: Could not load metrics. Please try again.

NutritionPage.title: Nutrition & Goals
NutritionPage.description: Log your meals, set your fitness goals, and share your progress with your trainer.
NutritionPage.myFitnessGoalDescription: Set or update your main fitness goal and upload progress photos for your trainer.
NutritionPage.fitnessGoalPlaceholder: e.g. Lose 5kg in 2 months, run 10k in under 60 minutes...
NutritionPage.progressImagesDescription: Upload up to 3 images (PNG, JPG, GIF).
NutritionPage.logNewMealDescription: Describe what you ate and optionally estimate the calories.
NutritionPage.LoggedMealPlaceholder: e.g., Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with toast (~300 kcal)
NutritionPage.noMealsLogged: No meals logged yet. Add one above!
NutritionPage.toastMealLoggedDesc: Your meal has been successfully added.
NutritionPage.toastMealDeletedDesc: The meal entry has been removed.
NutritionPage.toastDeletionFailedDesc: Could not delete the meal entry.
NutritionPage.toastGoalSavedDesc: Your fitness goal and photos have been updated.
NutritionPage.toastSaveFailedDesc: Could not save your goal and photos.
NutritionPage.toastInvalidCaloriesDesc: Please enter a valid number for calories.
NutritionPage.toastAuthErrorDesc: You must be signed in to do that.
NutritionPage.trainerMealPlanTitle: Your Trainer's Meal Plan for Today
NutritionPage.trainerMealPlanDesc: Meals recommended by your trainer for today.
NutritionPage.noTrainerMealsToday: No meals have been assigned by your trainer for today.
NutritionPage.toastErrorFetchingTrainerMeals: Could not load your trainer's meal plan.
NutritionPage.toastErrorFetchMeals: Could not load your meal history.
NutritionPage.toastErrorFetchProfile: Could not load your profile data.

motivation.fallback1: You’re stronger than you think. Every step counts — keep going!
motivation.fallback2: Progress isn't always visible, but it’s always happening. Stay committed!
motivation.fallback3: Believe in the goal, but trust in your effort even more.
motivation.fallback4: You showed up today — and that’s powerful.
motivation.fallback5: Small wins build big victories. You’ve got this!

UserProfilePage.title: My Profile
UserProfilePage.description: View and update your personal information.
UserProfilePage.personalDetailsDescription: Keep your information up to date.
UserProfilePage.toastProfileUpdatedDesc: Your profile information has been saved.
UserProfilePage.toastProfileLoadError: Could not load profile data. Please try refreshing the page.

WorkoutsPage.title: Your Workouts
WorkoutsPage.description: Follow your plan, track completion, and log any extra activities.
WorkoutsPage.noRoutineAssigned:
No workout routine assigned for today.
You can log an ad-hoc workout below, or check back later!
WorkoutsPage.logAdHocDescription: Completed something extra? Record it here.
WorkoutsPage.adHocPlaceholder: e.g., Went for a 30-minute bike ride, played basketball with friends...
WorkoutsPage.toastProgressSavedDesc: Your workout for today has been logged.
WorkoutsPage.toastSaveFailedDesc: Could not save your progress. Please try again.
WorkoutsPage.toastErrorGenericDesc: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
WorkoutsPage.toastErrorNoRoutineToSave: No routine or plan ID available to save.
WorkoutsPage.toastVideoPlaybackDesc: Video player for {videoUrl} would open here.
WorkoutsPage.toastWorkoutLoggedDesc: Your ad-hoc workout has been added.
WorkoutsPage.toastWorkoutDeletedDesc: The workout log has been removed.
WorkoutsPage.toastDeletionFailedDesc: Could not delete the workout log.
WorkoutsPage.myWorkoutNotesPlaceholder: Type any notes about your workout here...
WorkoutsPage.modalDescription: Complete your exercises and save your progress for the day.
WorkoutsPage.videoPlayerDescription: Select an exercise from the list to see a demonstration video.

FindTrainerPage.title: Find Your Trainer
FindTrainerPage.description: Browse our certified trainers and find the perfect match for your fitness journey.
FindTrainerPage.noTrainersAvailable: No trainers available at the moment. Please check back later.

TrainerDetailPage.trainerNotFoundDescription: The trainer profile you are looking for does not exist or could not be loaded.
TrainerDetailPage.noBioListed: No bio information provided by this trainer yet.
TrainerDetailPage.subscribePrompt: Ready to take the next step in your fitness journey with {trainerName}?
TrainerDetailPage.toastErrorSubscription: An unexpected error occurred during subscription.

TrainerDashboardPage.title: Trainer Dashboard
TrainerDashboardPage.description: Oversee your clients and manage their progress.
TrainerDashboardPage.clientManagementDescription: View and manage your client roster.
TrainerDashboardPage.clientManagementPlaceholder: Client list and management tools will appear here.
TrainerDashboardPage.refreshErrorToastDescription: Could not update your dashboard info.

TrainerProfilePage.title: My Trainer Profile
TrainerProfilePage.description: Showcase your expertise and experience to clients.
TrainerProfilePage.professionalInfoDescription: Update your details to keep clients informed.
TrainerProfilePage.summaryPlaceholder: Tell clients about yourself, your training philosophy, etc.
TrainerProfilePage.specializationsPlaceholder: e.g., Strength Training, Weight Loss, HIIT (comma-separated or list)
TrainerProfilePage.errorExperienceYears: Experience years must be a valid positive number.
TrainerProfilePage.toastProfileUpdatedDesc: Your profile information has been saved.
TrainerProfilePage.toastErrorDesc: There was an unexpected error. Please try again.

TrainerRoutinesPage.title: Manage Client Routines
TrainerRoutinesPage.description: Design and assign detailed workout routines for your clients.
TrainerRoutinesPage.newRoutineDescription: Select a client, define exercises, set the schedule, and optionally add notes or videos (video upload TBD).
TrainerRoutinesPage.frequencyWeekly: Weekly (Repeats on same day of week)
TrainerRoutinesPage.notesPlaceholder: e.g., Maintain proper form, use spotter if heavy, 60s rest between sets.
TrainerRoutinesPage.assignedRoutinesDescription: View and manage existing routines for your clients.
TrainerRoutinesPage.newNutritionPlanDescription: Select a client and add optional meal guidance per day.
TrainerRoutinesPage.mealDetailsPlaceholder: e.g., Oatmeal with fruits and almond milk
TrainerRoutinesPage.toastMissingInfoDesc: Please select a client, name the routine, set a start date, and fill all exercise details (name, sets, reps/duration).
TrainerRoutinesPage.toastAuthErrorDesc: You must be logged in to perform this action.
TrainerRoutinesPage.toastRoutineSavedDesc: Workout routine "{routineName}" for {clientName} has been saved.
TrainerRoutinesPage.toastSelectClientForNutrition: Please select a client for the nutrition plan.
TrainerRoutinesPage.toastFillAllMealDetails: Please fill out the time and details for all meals.
TrainerRoutinesPage.toastNoRoutineFoundDesc: Please create a workout routine for this client before assigning a nutrition plan.
TrainerRoutinesPage.toastNutritionSavedDesc: The nutrition plan has been assigned to the client.
TrainerRoutinesPage.toastNetworkErrorDesc: Could not save the plan due to a network error. Please try again.

MessagesPage.title: Messages
MessagesPage.selectAConversationDesc: Choose a person from the left to view messages.

TimelinePage.title: Timeline
TimelinePage.description: Share your journey and see what others in the community are up to.
TimelinePage.noPostsYet: The timeline is quiet... Be the first to post!
TimelinePage.toastPostFailed: Could not publish your post. Please try again.
TimelinePage.toastFileSizeErrorDesc: Please select a file smaller than 5MB.

PublicProfilePage.errorUserIdMissing: User ID is missing from the URL.
PublicProfilePage.errorLoadingProfile: Could not load this user's profile.
PublicProfilePage.profileNotFoundDescription: The profile you are looking for does not exist or could not be loaded.
PublicProfilePage.clientProfileMessage: This user is on their fitness journey with Vibrafit!

PendingRequestsPage.title: Pending Requests
PendingRequestsPage.description: Review and respond to new client subscription requests.
PendingRequestsPage.noPendingDescription: There are no pending requests at the moment.
PendingRequestsPage.toastSuccessDescription: The request from {clientName} has been {status, select, active {approved} rejected {rejected}}.

ClientDetailsModal.title: Client Details
ClientDetailsModal.description: Review the client's information before responding to their request.
ClientDetailsModal.noGoalSet: No goal has been set by the client yet.
